lines.text: Look, it's Mummy Dearest. Still all wrapped up in yourself, I see.
Shmodzilla is just like any unemployed actor, except that when he pounds the pavement, it registers a ten on the Ritcher scale.
You was expecting maybe Calvin Coolidge?

[reading comic]
Story continued in Hideous Tales, issue number 177... gee, that's nice.
Hideous Tales issue 177? Where is it, where is it?
